languages.text: "Мое тело уже исцелилось". {n}Ирлиэт благодарно кивает.{/n} "Душевные раны... однажды затянутся тоже. Ибо страдания есть часть нашей жизни, как и любовь, и страх, и жажда знаний. Пути помогают {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детям Азуриана{/g} вынести любое душевное потрясение, и ты, элантах, не позволил{mf||а} мне сойти с моего. За это... прими мою благодарность".

traits.locale_text: "Мое тело уже исцелилось". {n}Ирлиэт благодарно кивает.{/n} "Душевные раны... однажды затянутся тоже. Ибо страдания есть часть нашей жизни, как и любовь, и страх, и жажда знаний. Пути помогают {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детям Азуриана{/g} вынести любое душевное потрясение, и ты, элантах, не позволил{mf||а} мне сойти с моего. За это... прими мою благодарность".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "My body has already healed." {n}Yrliet nods gratefully.{/n} "The wounds of the soul... will heal one day, too. For suffering is a part of our life, not unlike love, and fear, and the desire to learn. The Paths help the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} to endure any spiritual upheaval, and you, elantach, did not allow me to stray from mine. For this... I am grateful."

languages.text: “我的身体已经愈合。”{n}伊莉耶特感激地点着头。{/n}“灵魂的创伤……或许有朝一日也会痊愈。苦难是我们生命中的一部分，与爱、恐惧、以及对知识的渴望并无不同。我们的道途会帮助{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}忍受精神方面的动荡。而你，外界人，你没有允许我偏离我的道途。对于这一点……我很感激。”
languages.original_text: "My body has already healed." {n}Yrliet nods gratefully.{/n} "The wounds of the soul... will heal one day, too. For suffering is a part of our life, not unlike love, and fear, and the desire to learn. The Paths help the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} to endure any spiritual upheaval, and you, elantach, did not allow me to stray from mine. For this... I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: “我的身体已经愈合。”{n}伊莉耶特感激地点着头。{/n}“灵魂的创伤……或许有朝一日也会痊愈。苦难是我们生命中的一部分，与爱、恐惧、以及对知识的渴望并无不同。我们的道途会帮助{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}忍受精神方面的动荡。而你，外界人，你没有允许我偏离我的道途。对于这一点……我很感激。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "My body has already healed." {n}Yrliet nods gratefully.{/n} "The wounds of the soul... will heal one day, too. For suffering is a part of our life, not unlike love, and fear, and the desire to learn. The Paths help the Children of Asuryan to endure any spiritual upheaval, and you, elantach, did not allow me to stray from mine. For this... I am grateful."

languages.text: «Mi cuerpo ya está curado». {n}Yrliet asiente, agradecida.{/n} «Las heridas del alma... también sanarán algún día. El sufrimiento también es parte de la vida, al igual que el amor, el miedo y el deseo de aprender. Las Sendas ayudan a los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g} a soportar todas las turbulencias del alma, y tú, elantach, no permitiste que me desviara del mío. Por eso... te doy las gracias».
languages.original_text: "My body has already healed." {n}Yrliet nods gratefully.{/n} "The wounds of the soul... will heal one day, too. For suffering is a part of our life, not unlike love, and fear, and the desire to learn. The Paths help the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} to endure any spiritual upheaval, and you, elantach, did not allow me to stray from mine. For this... I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: «Mi cuerpo ya está curado». {n}Yrliet asiente, agradecida.{/n} «Las heridas del alma... también sanarán algún día. El sufrimiento también es parte de la vida, al igual que el amor, el miedo y el deseo de aprender. Las Sendas ayudan a los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g} a soportar todas las turbulencias del alma, y tú, elantach, no permitiste que me desviara del mío. Por eso... te doy las gracias».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我の体はもう治った」{n}ユリエットは感謝するように頷いた。{/n}「魂の傷も…いつかは癒える。苦しみは人生の一部であり、愛や恐れ、学ぶことへの欲求とは違う。道は{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}が精神的な激変に耐えるのを助けてくれる。エランタ、お前は我が我の道から外れることを許さなかった。このことに…感謝する」
languages.original_text: "My body has already healed." {n}Yrliet nods gratefully.{/n} "The wounds of the soul... will heal one day, too. For suffering is a part of our life, not unlike love, and fear, and the desire to learn. The Paths help the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} to endure any spiritual upheaval, and you, elantach, did not allow me to stray from mine. For this... I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: 「我の体はもう治った」{n}ユリエットは感謝するように頷いた。{/n}「魂の傷も…いつかは癒える。苦しみは人生の一部であり、愛や恐れ、学ぶことへの欲求とは違う。道は{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}が精神的な激変に耐えるのを助けてくれる。エランタ、お前は我が我の道から外れることを許さなかった。このことに…感謝する」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Mein Körper ist bereits verheilt." {n}Yrliet nickt dankbar.{/n} "Die Wunden der Seele ... werden auch eines Tages verheilen. Denn das Leid ist ein Teil unseres Lebens, ähnlich wie die Liebe und die Angst und die Begierde, zu lernen. Die Pfade helfen den {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kindern von Asuryan{/g}, spirituelle Umstürze zu ertragen, und Ihr, Elantach, habt nicht zugelassen, dass ich von meinem Pfad abkomme. Dafür ... bin ich Euch dankbar."
languages.original_text: "My body has already healed." {n}Yrliet nods gratefully.{/n} "The wounds of the soul... will heal one day, too. For suffering is a part of our life, not unlike love, and fear, and the desire to learn. The Paths help the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} to endure any spiritual upheaval, and you, elantach, did not allow me to stray from mine. For this... I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Körper ist bereits verheilt." {n}Yrliet nickt dankbar.{/n} "Die Wunden der Seele ... werden auch eines Tages verheilen. Denn das Leid ist ein Teil unseres Lebens, ähnlich wie die Liebe und die Angst und die Begierde, zu lernen. Die Pfade helfen den {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kindern von Asuryan{/g}, spirituelle Umstürze zu ertragen, und Ihr, Elantach, habt nicht zugelassen, dass ich von meinem Pfad abkomme. Dafür ... bin ich Euch dankbar."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Mon corps est déjà guéri, {n}répond Yrliet en hochant la tête avec gratitude.{/n} Les blessures de mon âme... se refermeront un jour, elles aussi, car la souffrance fait partie de la vie, tout comme l'amour, la peur et le désir d'apprendre. Les Voies aident les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g} à endurer les bouleversements spirituels et vous, elantach, avez veillé à ce que je reste sur la mienne. De cela... je vous suis reconnaissante. »
languages.original_text: "My body has already healed." {n}Yrliet nods gratefully.{/n} "The wounds of the soul... will heal one day, too. For suffering is a part of our life, not unlike love, and fear, and the desire to learn. The Paths help the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} to endure any spiritual upheaval, and you, elantach, did not allow me to stray from mine. For this... I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: « Mon corps est déjà guéri, {n}répond Yrliet en hochant la tête avec gratitude.{/n} Les blessures de mon âme... se refermeront un jour, elles aussi, car la souffrance fait partie de la vie, tout comme l'amour, la peur et le désir d'apprendre. Les Voies aident les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g} à endurer les bouleversements spirituels et vous, elantach, avez veillé à ce que je reste sur la mienne. De cela... je vous suis reconnaissante. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Bedenim iyileşti bile." {n}Yrliet, minnettarlıkla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Ruhumda açılan yaralarsa... Onlar da bir gün iyileşecek. Çünkü çekilen acılar da hayatın bir parçasıdır; sevgi, korku ya da öğrenme arzusundan pek de farklı değillerdir. Yollar, {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları'na{/g} tüm ruhani kargaşalara dayanma gücü verir. Elantach, sen de yolumdan sapmama müsaade etmedin. Bundandır ki... Sana minnettarım."
languages.original_text: "My body has already healed." {n}Yrliet nods gratefully.{/n} "The wounds of the soul... will heal one day, too. For suffering is a part of our life, not unlike love, and fear, and the desire to learn. The Paths help the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} to endure any spiritual upheaval, and you, elantach, did not allow me to stray from mine. For this... I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: "Bedenim iyileşti bile." {n}Yrliet, minnettarlıkla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Ruhumda açılan yaralarsa... Onlar da bir gün iyileşecek. Çünkü çekilen acılar da hayatın bir parçasıdır ve sevgi, korku ya da öğrenme arzusundan pek de farklı değildir. Yollar, {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları{/g}'na tüm ruhani kargaşalara dayanma gücü verir. Elantach, sen de yolumdan sapmama müsaade etmedin. Bundandır ki... Sana minnettarım."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
